author: jstrachan
msg: Applied patches kindly supplied by Christian Sell to add support for Ant style addFoo(Foo) methods when using the bean tag library.

Also added an extra test case to show the use of both MyBeanTagLibrary which inherits from BeanTagLibrary as well as a test case using a normal TagLibrary which just reuses the BeanTag and BeanPropertyTag
